alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Houston; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:39PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bibb, southwestern Twiggs and northeastern Houston Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 439 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Elberta, or 11 miles south of Macon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, nickel sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Warner Robins, Centerville, Robins AFB, Marion, Robins Air Force Base, Bullard, Elberta, Middle Georgia Regional Airport, Ripley, and Huber. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central Georgia.
